verbs.description: " If you [V: ca] n't beat them , join them , " the former presidential candidate quipped , suggesting that Russia was behind Donald Trump 's victory over her in the 2016 presidential election . Robert Mueller 's investigation into the Trump campaign 's ties to Russia is into its second year .
